column4: How do I open the File Manager as a root user?  I try to check the box on the share settings that enables "guest connections", and I can not check the box because it is greyed out.  Help?
How can I verify that samba is running?
How can I verify that samba is not corrupt?
I thing the easiest way would be to press Alt+F2 and then type in "gksudo nautilus"
